## SessionStorageCookieOptions.sameSite property

Defines SameSite attribute of the Set-Cookie Header. https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Headers/Set-Cookie/SameSite

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
sameSite?: 'Strict' | 'Lax' | 'None';
```
